channel.title: How long does it take
channel.description: Does anyone know how long it takes to get approved? It's been over 48 hours and my app hasn't been looked at once, I mean just curious I'd like to be able to start bidding.

item.title: How long does it take
item.dc:creator: @Travis_02 Travis_02
item.description:
@Travis_02 wrote:

Then why not inform the future applicants? And hes been on and posted? So thats not really the reason…

Read full topic

item.title: How long does it take
item.dc:creator: @Travis_02 Travis_02
item.description:
@Travis_02 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:7, topic:376571”][quote author=Travis_02 link=topic=472497.msg3455566#msg3455566 date=1294011940]
Then it would’ve been declined? Not left waiting?
Also it hasn’t even been looked at?
[/quote]
Then wait for it to be looked at. I would suppose he is going to start looking at them when it near the next bidding month.[/quote]

I posted the application last month so why would I have to wait another month to bid? Everyone I’ve asked thats done it was approved right off on the first when bidding started again.

Read full topic
